name: Dragons Gate
description:
This is a premium game, no inapp purchases or ads. Pay once and play.
----------------------------
Enter the magical fantasy world of Dragons Gate and explore numerous enchanting locations of the magical kingdom! Complete the quests of the ancient dragons and uncover the secret of the Dragons Gate world in this classic adventure game. Visit all 72 magical locations of the kingdom including Elven Enchanted Forest, Lonely Hills, The Capital of Scara and many more.

Explore numerous quests to keep you entertained for months
● 72 amazing locations full of entertainment
● Complete the main quest and uncover the ancient dragons tablets
● Amazing hand drawn colourful graphics
● Professional soundtrack by award winning composer
● A huge collections (250+) of hidden objects to piece together
● Intuitive and simple touch interface
● Easy to learn and fun game for all ages

Game available in the following languages: English, Russian (more languages are coming soon)
